pr_title: Sb track2 remove Locktoken Interface  and use String for lockToken

timeline.message: Increment package version after release of com.azure azure-messaging-servicebus
Removing locktoken interface and using String instead.

timeline.author: conniey
conniey

timeline.bodyText: You don't need to mock this anymore you can set the string and return it.
timeline.author: conniey

timeline.bodyText: The check doesn't match the documentation. This throws a NPE rather than IllegalArgumentExceptionwhen lockToken is null.
timeline.author: conniey

timeline.bodyText: The check doesn't match the documentation. This throws a NPE rather than IllegalArgumentExceptionwhen lockToken is null.

replies.bodyText: Yes , I realize that. Thanks. I will change documentation.
